info.name: 19. Use Case - Skrining PTM
info.description:
For **complete repository for all SATUSEHAT use-cases** please access our public workspaces : [Postman Workspaces](https://s.id/PostmanSATUSEHAT) For **detailed SATUSEHAT use-cases import link** please see : [Postman Public Kemkes Link](https://link.kemkes.go.id/PostmanSATUSEHAT) Any information about SATUSEHAT FHIR Profile could be accessed through [Simplifier FHIR Profile](https://simplifier.net/guide/SATUSEHAT-FHIR-R4-Implementation-Guide/Home/FHIRProfiles?version=current) | **Folder History** | **Editor** | **Date** | | --- | --- | --- | | Versi Pertama API sesuai dengan Playbook Skrining Penyakit Tidak Menular (PTM) V1.0 | [Thomas Chaidir](https://mailto:thomas.chaidir@dto.kemkes.go.id)

[Raden Nurilma](https://mailto:raden.hidayatullah@dto.kemkes.go.id)

[Anisatul Afifah](https://mailto:anisatul.afifah@dto.kemkes.go.id) | 24 Juni 2024 |
